title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3936/88 of 16 December 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 639/86 fixing the quotas for imports into Portugal of certain vegetables from the Canary Islands
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3936/88
of 16 December 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 639/86 fixing the quotas for imports into Portugal of certain vegetables from the Canary Islands
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1989.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 54, 1. 3. 1986, p. 49.
(2) OJ No L 60, 1. 3. 1986, p. 30.
(3) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1987, p. 23.
ANNEX
